title: Vertex AI Search and Conversation - Configure facets for the search widget
abstract:
# Vertex AI Search and Conversation - Configure facets for the search widget
Facets can be shown next to results in the search widget to help users filter the results. You can use the **Configurations** page in the Google Cloud console to specify which fields to use as dynamic facets on your widget for apps with structured data or unstructured data with metadata.
Facet configuration is not supported for widgets for apps with website data or unstructured data without metadata.
Before setting a field as a facet, make sure the field is set to **Retrievable** . For more information, see [Configure fieldsettings](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/configure-field-settings) .
To set a field as a facet:
- In the Google Cloud console, go to the **Search and Conversation** page. [Search and Conversation](https://console.cloud.google.com/gen-app-builder/start) 
- Click the name of the app that you want to edit.
- Click **Configurations** .
- Click the **Widget** tab.
- Expand the **Facet settings** section.
- Click **Add facet** .
- Select a field to use as a facet.
- Enter a display name for the facet.
- Click **Save and publish**
